## PlayerService class

The SteamUser class provides methods to query the Steam API regarding informations about a Steam user.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class PlayerService 
```

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(configuration)](./steam-ts.playerservice._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>PlayerService</code> class |

|  [getRecentlyPlayedGames](./steam-ts.playerservice.getrecentlyplayedgames.md) |  | <code>(steamId: string, count?: number) =&gt; Promise&lt;RecentGame[]&gt;</code> | Return the list of the recently played games of a player. |
